[小売物価統計調査 小売物価統計調査（動向編）主要品目の都市別小売価格－都道府県庁所在市及び人口15万以上の市(2000年1月～) | 統計表・グラフ表示 | 政府統計の総合窓口](https://www.e-stat.go.jp/dbview?sid=0003421913){target="_blank"} からデータを入手する。

```{r}
#| message: false
library(readr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(gghighlight)
library(ggsci)

figdir <- "../fig"
dir.create(figdir, showWarnings = FALSE)

d <- read_csv("../data/卸売市場経由率の推移.csv")

d_long <- pivot_longer(d, cols = -年度, names_to = "name", values_to = "value")
d_long$name <- factor(d_long$name, levels = unique(d_long$name))

g <- ggplot(data = d_long, aes(x = 年度, y = value, group = name, colour = name)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  gghighlight(min(value) > 0) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 100)) +
  labs(title = "卸売市場経由率の推移",
       x = "年度", 
       y = "%",
       caption = "農林水産省(2024)「令和4年度 卸売市場データ集」") +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(
#   text = element_text(family = "Hiragino Sans"),
    legend.position = "none"
  ) +
  scale_color_d3()
g + theme(text = element_text(family = "HiraKakuProN-W3"))

ggsave(filename = "wholesale_market_trends.pdf", plot = g, path = figdir, width = 10, height = 5)
# ggsave("wholesale_market_trends.pdf", plot = g, device = cairo_pdf, path = ".", width = 10, height = 5)
```
